text: Costs and expenses of all proceedings held under this chapter shall be paid as follows:
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 6-1952.

1973 Ed., § 6-1679.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-137, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-1301.02.

DC CODE § 7-1304.12

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: To expert witnesses designated by the Court, an amount determined by the Court;
To attorneys appointed under this chapter, fees as authorized under the Criminal Justice Act (§ 11-2601 et seq.);
To other witnesses, the same fees and mileage as for attendance at Court to be paid upon the approval of the Court.

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Rights of Citizens with Intellectual Disabilities. (Refs & Annos)
